mapper.select: select count(*) from reply where shopNo = #{shopNo}
mapper.insert: insert into reply(replyNo, content, id, shopNo) values(reply_seq.nextval, #{content}, #{id}, #{shopNo})
mapper.update:
update reply set content=#{content}
where id = #{id} and replyNo = #{replyNo}
mapper.delete:
delete from reply
where id = #{id} and replyNo = #{replyNo}
